data.name: AddrBook
data.comment: Address book

data.name: CalibratingCameraRemainStill
data.value: Calibrando câmera... Por favor, fique parado

data.name: CantSaveAbbreviation
data.value: Não pode salvar. Abreviatura de '{0}' já existe
data.comment: {0} is the abbreviation

data.name: ConfirmSwitchLanguage
data.comment: {0} is the language to switch to

data.name: ConfirmSwitchToWindow
data.comment: {0} is the title of the window to switch to

data.name: ContextInitializationErrorException
data.value: Erro de inicialização do contexto. Exceção: {0}
data.comment: {0} is the error

data.name: CouldNotCreateFolder
data.value: Não foi possível criar a pasta {0}.
data.comment: {0} is the name of the folder

data.name: CouldNotCreateUserError
data.value: Erro. Não foi possível criar a pasta para o usuário {0}.
data.comment: {0}is the name of the user

data.name: CouldNotFindProfile
data.value: Não foi possível encontrar o perfil {0}
data.comment: {0}is the name of the profile

data.name: DeleteAbbr
data.comment: {0} is the abbreviation that is to be deleted

data.name: DeleteFileQ
data.comment: {0} is the name of the file to delete

data.name: EnableDebugTraceLogging
data.value: Habilitar o log de rastreamento de depuração

data.name: EnableVerticalRectangleScan
data.value: Habilitar a verificação de retângulo vertical

data.name: Explorer
data.comment: Windows Explorer

data.name: ExplorerFileOps
data.comment: File Operations

data.name: InvalidFormName
data.comment: {0}is the name of the form

data.name: LaunchAppQ
data.comment: {0} is the name of the application to launch

data.name: LectureMgr
data.comment: Lecture Manager - context menu title

data.name: LoadThisDocIntoLM
data.value: Carregar este documento no Gerenciador de Palestra?

data.name: MicrosoftWord
data.comment: This is in the title of a word document, usually the file name followed by Microsoft Word. Take care while translating

data.name: Msecs
data.comment: Milliseconds

data.name: MuteSpeaker
data.value: Ativar a Opção Mudo do Alto-Falante?

data.name: NewPinSaveChanges
data.comment: {0} is the numeric pin

data.name: NoCameraSelectedVisionWillNotBeActivated
data.value: Nenhuma câmera selecionada. ACAT Vision não será ativado

data.name: NoCamerasFoundACATVisionDisabled
data.value: Nenhuma câmera encontrada! ACAT Vision será desativado

data.name: NoProgramAssociatedWithFile
data.value: Nenhum programa associado ao arquivo. Abrir de qualquer forma?

data.name: Notepad
data.comment: Set this to the title of the Notepad application window. It is displayed in the titlebar of Notepad. If it says "Notepad" in English, don't translate this string.

data.name: OpenFileQ
data.comment: {0}is the name of the file to open

data.name: Outlook2010AddrBookAddToContactsButtonText
data.comment: This has to exactly match the text on the "Add to contacts"button in the Address book.

data.name: Outlook2010AddrBookFirstNameFieldLabel
data.comment: This has to exactly match the label of the "First"name in the name field in the Address book window. ACATuses this string to determine whether the field is the "First"name field

data.name: Outlook2010AddrBookLastNameFieldLabel
data.comment: This has to exactly match the label of the "Last" name in the name field in the Address book window. ACATuses this string to determine whether the field is the "Last"name field

data.name: Outlook2010AddrBookSearchFieldLabel
data.comment: This has to exactly match the label of the field in the Address book window. ACATuses this string to determine whether the field is the Search field

data.name: Outlook2010ApptSchedulingAddAttendeesButtonText
data.comment: This has to exactly match the text of the Add Attendees button in the Scheduling tab in the Open Appointment window.

data.name: Outlook2010ApptSchedulingAllAttendeesList
data.comment: This has to exactly match the label of the "All Attendees"list in the Scheduling tab in the Open Appointment window.

data.name: Outlook2010ApptSchedulingMeetingStartDateFieldLabel
data.comment: This has to exactly match the text of the label of the Meeting Start Date field the Scheduling tab in the OPen Appointment window.

data.name: Outlook2010EmailTitleSuffixHTML
data.comment: This has to exactly match the suffix of the title of an email window for a HTML formatted email. ACAT uses this string to determine whether the window is an email window.

data.name: Outlook2010EmailTitleSuffixPlainText
data.comment: This has to exactly match the suffix of the title of an email window for a Plain Text formatted email. ACAT uses this string to determine whether the window is an email window.

data.name: Outlook2010EmailTitleSuffixRichText
data.comment: This has to exactly match the suffix of the title of an email window for a RichText formatted email. ACAT uses this string to determine whether the window is an email window.

data.name: Outlook2010OpenAppointmentStartDateFieldLabel
data.comment: This has to exactly match the label of the start date field in the open Appointment window. ACATuses this string to determine whether the field is the start date field

data.name: Outlook2010OpenAppointmentSubjectFieldLabel
data.comment: This has to exactly match the label of the subject field in the open Appointment window. ACATuses this string to determine whether the field is the Subject field

data.name: Outlook2010OpenContactCompanyFieldLabel
data.comment: This has to exactly match the label of the Company field in the open Contact window. ACATuses this string to determine whether the field is the Company field

data.name: Outlook2010OpenContactFullNameFieldLabel
data.comment: This has to exactly match the label of the Full Name field in the open Contact window. ACATuses this string to determine whether the field is the Full Name field

data.name: Outlook2010OpenContactJobTitleFieldLabel
data.comment: This has to exactly match the label of the Job Title field in the open Contact window. ACATuses this string to determine whether the field is the Job Title field

data.name: Outlook2010OpenTaskPercentCompleteFieldLabel
data.comment: This has to exactly match the label of the % complete field in the open Task window. ACATuses this string to determine whether the field is the % Complete field

data.name: Outlook2010OpenTaskPriorityFieldLabel
data.comment: This has to exactly match the label of the Priority field in the open Task window. ACATuses this string to determine whether the field is the Priority field

data.name: Outlook2010OpenTaskStatusFieldLabel
data.comment: This has to exactly match the label of the Status field in the open Task window. ACATuses this string to determine whether the field is the Status field

data.name: Outlook2010OpenTaskSubjectFieldLabel
data.comment: This has to exactly match the label of the Subject field in the open Task window. ACATuses this string to determine whether the field is the Subject field

data.name: Outlook2010TitleAddressBook
data.comment: This has to exactly match the title of the Address Book window in Outlook 2010. ACATuses this string to determine whether the window is the Address Book window.

data.name: Outlook2010TitleCalendarPrefix
data.comment: This has to exactly match the prefix of the title of the Calendar window in Outlook. ACATuses this string to determine whether the window is the Calendar window.

data.name: Outlook2010TitleContactsPrefix
data.comment: This has to exactly match the prefix of the title of the Contacts window in Outlook. ACATuses this string to determine whether the window is the Contacts window.

data.name: Outlook2010TitleNotesPrefix
data.comment: This has to exactly match the prefix of the title of the Notes window in Outlook. ACATuses this string to determine whether the window is the Notes window.

data.name: Outlook2010TitleSuffix
data.comment: This has to exactly match the suffix of the title of the Contacts, Notes and Tasks window. ACATuses this string to determine whether the window is the Contacts, Notes or Tasks window.

data.name: Outlook2010TitleTasksPrefix
data.comment: This has to exactly match the prefix of the title of the Tasks window in Outlook. ACATuses this string to determine whether the window is the Tasks window.

data.name: Outlook2010TitleTodoPrefix
data.comment: This has to exactly match the prefix of the title of the To-do list window in Outlook. ACATuses this string to determine whether the window is the To-do list window.

data.name: Outlook2013AddrBookAddToContactsButtonText
data.comment: This has to exactly match the text on the "Add to contacts"button in the Address book.

data.name: Outlook2013AddrBookFirstNameFieldLabel
data.comment: This has to exactly match the label of the "First"name in the name field in the Address book window. ACATuses this string to determine whether the field is the "First"name field

data.name: Outlook2013AddrBookLastNameFieldLabel
data.comment: This has to exactly match the label of the "Last" name in the name field in the Address book window. ACATuses this string to determine whether the field is the "Last"name field

data.name: Outlook2013AddrBookSearchFieldLabel
data.comment: This has to exactly match the label of the field in the Address book window. ACATuses this string to determine whether the field is the Search field

data.name: Outlook2013EmailTitleSuffixHTML
data.comment: This has to exactly match the suffix of the title of an email window for a HTML formatted email. ACAT uses this string to determine whether the window is an email window.

data.name: Outlook2013EmailTitleSuffixPlainText
data.comment: This has to exactly match the suffix of the title of an email window for a Plain Text formatted email. ACAT uses this string to determine whether the window is an email window.

data.name: Outlook2013EmailTitleSuffixRichText
data.comment: This has to exactly match the suffix of the title of an email window for a RichText formatted email. ACAT uses this string to determine whether the window is an email window.

data.name: Outlook2013OpenContactCompanyFieldLabel
data.comment: This has to exactly match the label of the Company field in the open Contact window. ACATuses this string to determine whether the field is the Company field

data.name: Outlook2013OpenContactFullNameFieldLabel
data.comment: This has to exactly match the label of the Full Name field in the open Contact window. ACATuses this string to determine whether the field is the Full Name field

data.name: Outlook2013OpenContactJobTitleFieldLabel
data.comment: This has to exactly match the label of the Job Title field in the open Contact window. ACATuses this string to determine whether the field is the Job Title field

data.name: Outlook2013OpenTaskPercentCompleteFieldLabel
data.comment: This has to exactly match the label of the % complete field in the open Task window. ACATuses this string to determine whether the field is the % Complete field

data.name: Outlook2013OpenTaskPriorityFieldLabel
data.comment: This has to exactly match the label of the Priority field in the open Task window. ACATuses this string to determine whether the field is the Priority field

data.name: Outlook2013OpenTaskStatusFieldLabel
data.comment: This has to exactly match the label of the Status field in the open Task window. ACATuses this string to determine whether the field is the Status field

data.name: Outlook2013TitleAddressBook
data.comment: This has to exactly match the title of the Address Book window in Outlook 2010. ACATuses this string to determine whether the window is the Address Book window.

data.name: Outlook2013TitleCalendarPrefix
data.comment: This has to exactly match the prefix of the title of the Calendar window in Outlook. ACATuses this string to determine whether the window is the Calendar window.

data.name: Outlook2013TitleContactsPrefix
data.comment: This has to exactly match the prefix of the title of the Contacts window in Outlook. ACATuses this string to determine whether the window is the Contacts window.

data.name: Outlook2013TitleNotesPrefix
data.comment: This has to exactly match the prefix of the title of the Notes window in Outlook. ACATuses this string to determine whether the window is the Notes window.

data.name: Outlook2013TitleSuffix
data.comment: This has to exactly match the suffix of the title of the Contacts, Notes and Tasks window. ACATuses this string to determine whether the window is the Contacts, Notes or Tasks window.

data.name: Outlook2013TitleTodoPrefix
data.comment: This has to exactly match the prefix of the title of the To-do list window in Outlook. ACATuses this string to determine whether the window is the To-do list window.

data.name: OutlookAttachFileWindowTitle
data.comment: This string should be verbatim what's on the title of the window when you attach a file to a new email

data.name: PageNofM
data.comment: {0} is the current page number and {1} is the total number of pages

data.name: PinHasToBeWithinLimits
data.value: PIN deve conter entre {0} e {1} dígitos
data.comment: {0 {0} is the lower limit (minimum)and {1}is the upper limit (maximum)

data.name: PinOutsideRange
data.value: PIN tem dígitos fora do intervalo válido

data.name: RangeFromTo
data.comment: {0} is the lower limit of the range and {1} is the upper limit of the range

data.name: RetainTalkWindowTextOnClose
data.value: Manter o texto da janela de Conversa ao fechar

data.name: Secs
data.comment: Seconds

data.name: SelectedCamera
data.comment: {0}is the name of the camera

data.name: SendSpeechControlSequence
data.value: Enviar a sequência de controle do discurso?

data.name: SetVolumeTo
data.comment: {0} is the volume setting

data.name: ShowGlassUnderTalkWindow
data.value: Mostrar vidro sob a janela de conversa

data.name: ShowTalkWindowOnStartup
data.value: Mostrar a janela de Conversa na inicialização

data.name: TalkWindowTestString
data.comment: Test string to select the size of font in the Talk window

data.name: ThisMessageBoxWillClose
data.value: Esta caixa de mensagem vai fechar em {0} segundos
data.comment: {0} is the number of seconds

data.name: TryoutWord1
data.comment: First word in the ACATTryoutApp. The letters in the word should be one of the letters in the ACATryout keyboard panel

data.name: TryoutWord2
data.comment: Second word in the ACATTryoutApp. The letters in the word should be one of the letters in the ACATryout keyboard panel

data.name: TryoutWord3
data.comment: Third word in the ACATTryoutApp. The letters in the word should be one of the letters in the ACATryout keyboard panel

data.name: TryoutWord4
data.comment: Fourth word in the ACATTryoutApp. The letters in the word should be one of the letters in the ACATryout keyboard panel

data.name: TryoutWord5
data.comment: Fifth word in the ACATTryoutApp. The letters in the word should be one of the letters in the ACATryout keyboard panel

data.name: TryoutWord6
data.comment: Sixth word in the ACATTryoutApp. The letters in the word should be one of the letters in the ACATryout keyboard panel

data.name: TryoutWord7
data.comment: Seventh word in the ACATTryoutApp. The letters in the word should be one of the letters in the ACATryout keyboard panel

data.name: UnableCreateUserErrorExecutingBatchfile
data.value: Não foi possível criar o usuário. Erro ao executar o arquivo batch {0}. \nErro: {1}
data.comment: {0} is the name of the batch file, {1} is the error

data.name: UnableToReadPreferences
data.value: Não foi possível ler as preferências de {0}
data.comment: {0} is the name of the preferences file

data.name: Version
data.comment: {0} is the version number

data.name: WindowsMediaPlayer
data.comment: Set this to the title of the Windows Media Player application window. It is displayed in the titlebar of Windows Media Player. If it says "Windows Media Player" in English, don't translate this string.

data.name: WindowsPhotoViewer
data.comment: This is the title of the Windows Photo Viewer window. Set it appropriately after verifying on a computer with the culture installed

data.name: WordListFirstPauseTime
data.value: Primeira pausa na lista de palavras

data.name: YouAreChangingExistingAbbr
data.value: Você está alterando a abrev. existente {0}. Continuar?
data.comment: {0} is the abbreviation

data.name: MicrosoftEdge
data.comment: This is in the title of the Microsoft Edge Browser. Usually the title is the name of the web page followed by a hypen, followed by the phrase "Microsoft Edge". The title bar is hidden for Microsoft Edge. You may have to use a 3rd party tool such as UISpy.exe to get the title. The translation should match whatever comes after the hyphen. Translate it appropriately after verifying on a computer with the culture installed. ACATuses this string to identify the Microsoft Edge window

data.name: TextToSpeechTestString
data.value: Isto é um teste. Um dois três quatro cinco.
data.comment: This is the test string to test the volume/rate/pitch of text-to-speech.
